name: Excuse Me, Barkeep! A Lesson in Mixology
name_original: Excuse Me, Barkeep! A Lesson in Mixology
description:
Serve some dreamy drinks to the patrons of MoonBeam.

Please report bugs to me, and I'll do my best to fix them up! Some changes were made in a rush, and there are some drinks that code overlap, so I will do my best to make changes based on what people notice.
